means: Liverpool 利物浦（英国英格兰西部港口城市）
Liverpudlian(s) 利物浦的，利物浦市民

word_mean: 肝：位于右上腹部的一个暗红色大腺体。〔NA〕称hepar。其上部为圆顶形，与横膈右下面紧密相贴，具有来自肝动脉与门静脉的双重血液供应。它由无数个微细的小叶(肝的功能单位)所组成。另见acinus项下的liver acinus及lobule项下的portal lobule。肝有许多功能，包括血液的贮存和滤过，分泌胆汁，排泄胆红素和身体其他部位所形成的其他物质，及许多代谢功能，包括将糖转化为糖原并进行贮存。肝为生命所必需。某些动物的肝常供作食物，或以其制成多种药物
肝，五脏之一，位于腹部，膈之下，右胁之内。其主要生理功能是主疏泄和主藏血，并与筋、目密切相关。

sentence.Network_en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
sentence.Network_cn: 肝脏和肾脏富含维生素A。

sentence.Network_en: Liver cancer is linked to the hepatitis B virus.
sentence.Network_cn: 肝癌与乙肝病毒存在关联。

sentence.Network_en: These compounds bind with genetic material in the liver.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些化合物在肝脏中与遗传物质实现结合。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English lifer, of Germanic origin; related to German Leber, Dutch lever

entry.def: Your liver is a large organ in your body which processes your blood and helps to clean unwanted substances out of it.

entry.tran: （尤指猪、牛、羊等动物供食用的）肝
entry.def: Liver is the liver of some animals, especially lambs, pigs, and cows, which is cooked and eaten.

means.word_mean: 1. large and complicated reddish-brown glandular organ located in the upper right portion of the abdominal cavity; secretes bile and functions in metabolism of protein and carbohydrate and fat; synthesizes substances involved in the clotting of the blood;
2. liver of an animal used as meat
3. a person who has a special life style;
4. someone who lives in a place;
